special: Strixhaven's Lessons are playable in a pseudo-sideboard that can contain up to 7 lessons.

explanations.Gideon's Intervention: The mana value of the card is too high to pose a real threat to the format, despite being able to lock the cast of the commander.
explanations.Phyrexian Revoker: Phyrexian Revoker is able to deal with Planeswalkers, preventing them from being activated. Having a double type permits players to deal with this card more easily. We assume that this card is not a threat to the format and is thereby unbanned.
explanations.Underworld Breach: This card has been initially banned as it was baned in Pioneer. After careful tests, this card is not much of a threat in this format. Underworld Breach is now unbanned and remains under scrutiny.
